org.afree.ui

Class StandardGradientShaderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.afree.ui.StandardGradientShaderFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, GradientShaderFactory

    public class StandardGradientShaderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements GradientShaderFactory, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Transforms a GradientPaint to range over the width of a target shape.
